lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade is leaving the Miami Heat for the Chicago Bulls, returning to the city of his birth, multiple media outlets reported on Wednesday.

headline.main: Wade Leaving Miami Heat for Chicago Bulls: Reports
headline.print_headline: Wade Leaving Miami Heat for Chicago Bulls: Reports

snippet: Dwyane Wade is leaving the Miami Heat for the Chicago Bulls, returning to the city of his birth, multiple media outlets reported on Wednesday....
